directions: Stir whipped topping, ice cream and dry gelatin in large bowl until well blended. Stir in cake cubes. Spoon into 8-inch square pan.
Drizzle with raspberry preserves. Cut into squares. Top each square with 1 peach slice and 1 raspberry. Store leftover dessert in freezer.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) tub COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed
1 pkg. (4 serving size)  JELL-O Brand Peach Flavor Gelatin (unprepared)
title: Frozen Peach Shortcake Squares
